abstracts.cdata!:
The project would support GOB's
            efforts to stimulate interest among foreign investors to
            resume petroleum exploration in Bangladesh through a proper
            assessment of petroleum prospects, including an
            identification of areas where immediate further exploration
            is warranted, as part of a promotional package to be made
            available to interested foreign investors.  It would also
            assist in the acquisition of critical data that are
            necessary for delineating and developing existing gas fields
            as well as help improve and strengthen the exploration and
            technical capabilities of Petrobangla.  The project will
            comprise:  (a) seismic surveys of about 2,400 line km; (b) a
            hydrocarbon habitat study which will collate, reinterpret
            and integrate all available as well as newly acquired
            seismic, geological and geochemical data; and (c) a program
            of assistance to Petrobangla in the technical, financial and
            legal fields.
